welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Old Forge, a charming city known for its breathtaking landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wilkes-Barre/Scranton International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wilkes-Barre/Wyoming Valley Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wilkes-Barre/Wyoming Valley Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mt Pocono Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Mt Pocono Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hazleton Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
